contentList.content: A creature that you can see within range glimmers with a red light. For the duration of the spell, they are vulnerable to Fire damage.
This creature is now vulnerable to Fire damage.
This creature is now vulnerable to Cold damage.
A creature that you can see within range glimmers with a blue light. For the duration of the spell, they are vulnerable to Cold damage.
This creature is now vulnerable to Electric damage.
A creature that you can see within range glimmers with a purple light. For the duration of the spell, they are vulnerable to Electric damage.
